price: Hakika tumekuteremshia Ishara zilizo wazi na hapana wanao zikataa ila wapotovu.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖۖ وَمَا يَكۡفُرُ بِهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ
footnotes: Na Jibril hateremshi kwenye moyo wako kila Ishara na hoja zilizo wazi, ambazo haiwezekani kwa mwenye kutafuta haki kikweli ila aziamini tu. Na hapana mwenye kuzikataa Ishara kama hizo ila wale wafanyao inda na inadi, ambao wametokana na mwenendo wa maumbile walio umbwa nao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaqad anzalnā ilayka āyātin bayyinātin wamā yakfuru bihā illā al-fāsiqūna
